targeted_script_snippet: First the tool extracts the audio from my video footage and uses OpenAI Whisper to transcribe all of the audio.
Using the OpenAI Agents SDK, ive created an agent that receives the transcript and the original script for the video.
The agent is then tasked with selecting the correct snippets from the video footage to export. Removing all of the mistakes or duplicate lines and then returning a response in a JSON format.
Using the moviepy package, I'm then making cuts to the original video clip so that I can render the new clips separately and allow the user to download them as a zip file.
